price: El día que acometa con el máximo rigor, les infligiré un castigo doloroso.
arabic: يَوۡمَ نَبۡطِشُ ٱلۡبَطۡشَةَ ٱلۡكُبۡرَىٰٓ إِنَّا مُنتَقِمُونَ
footnotes: Por haber rechazado el monoteísmo y cometido serias injusticias contra los creyentes.

version.title: Spanish Translation - Isa Garcia
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into Spanish by Muhammad Isa Garcia - Printed in 1433 H.

meta.transliteration: yawma nabṭishu al-baṭshata al-kub'rā innā muntaqimūna
